channel.title: Hucci- A whole new Combat System
channel.description:
[b][center]Hi, My name is Rees. Aka Pablo/Tuco.. My english aint the best im from Amsterdam. This is my story, My way of the combat system.. Hucci.
Founder: Rees/Tuco Developers: Needed ( Paid ), Atm Developers: Stan ( but he is bussy with school )
So i need some experiend Java developer ( PAID )[/center]
[center]Skype: Rafr200[/center]
[B]The Upgraded Combat System[/B] Runescape has had over a million updates but the most important updates are the combat related ones.. The change of the special or the emote when hitting something, RS has changed a lot from 07’ – 012’ And I am going to rip the best parts out of all the small updates they have been making since 07.. Lately Rs got upgraded to a new Combat system, thousands of players quit.. Now you may ask why? Well ya its very simple, it aint RS no more.. To many special/bonus/rare hits.. But even though the emotes and gfx are very good looking! Now also a reason why they stop playing is cus things which we have developed as players are not possible no more, one of these things is Bridding. Hybriding was a mix of all the combat styles we can use in game to play with the other, you can make people crazy with hybridding, mostly used with Magic & melee. And That’s why bridding will be smooth as f*ck in my combat system!
[CENTER][B][I]Pictures coming soon..[/I][/B] [IMG]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8346/8230078319_7d2b4e566d_h.jpg[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Hucci- A whole new Combat System
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I’m sorry… but I had to stop at this part:

Runescape has had over a million updates but the most important updates are the combat related ones
Because that is not true at all. There's a lot more to RuneScape than just combat. There are seven skills that require combat: Attack, Strength, Defence, Constitution, Magic, and Summoning. Other combat related skills like Prayer, Slayer, and Dungeoneering can be trained without even attacking a monster and have been done before. The rest of the skills, and two more coming out this year, don't require combat at all. But good luck with this.

Read full topic
item.source: Hucci- A whole new Combat System
